mapper.select: SELECT T_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_IDX , T_SCHEDULE.CLASSROOM_IDX , T_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULETIME_IDX , T_SCHEDULE.WEEK , T_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_DATE , T_SCHEDULE.USE_YN , T_SCHEDULE.DELETE_YN , T_SCHEDULE.CREATE_USER_IDX , T_SCHEDULE.UPDATE_USER_IDX , T_SCHEDULE.DELETE_USER_IDX , T_SCHEDULE.UPDATE_DATETIME , T_SCHEDULE.CREATE_DATETIME , T_SCHEDULE.DELETE_DATETIME , T_USER_CREATE.USER_NAME AS CREATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_UPDATE.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_DELETE.USER_NAME AS DELETE_USER_NAME , T_DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_IDX , T_DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_NAME , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.YEAR_SEMESTER_IDX , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.YEAR , T_YEAR_SEMESTER.SEMESTER , T_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_IDX , T_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME , T_SCHEDULETIME.CLASS_TIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.START_TIME , T_SCHEDULETIME.END_TIME , T_CLASSROOM.CLASSROOM FROM TB_SCHEDULE AS T_SCHEDULE LEFT JOIN TB_SCHEDULETIME AS T_SCHEDULETIME ON T_SCHEDULETIME.SCHEDULETIME_IDX = T_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULETIME_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_CLASSROOM AS T_CLASSROOM ON T_CLASSROOM.CLASSROOM_IDX = T_SCHEDULE.CLASSROOM_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT AS T_DEPARTMENT ON T_DEPARTMENT.DEPARTMENT_IDX = T_CLASSROOM.DEPARTMENT_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_YEAR_SEMESTER AS T_YEAR_SEMESTER ON T_YEAR_SEMESTER.YEAR_SEMESTER_IDX = T_CLASSROOM.YEAR_SEMESTER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_SUBJECT AS T_SUBJECT ON T_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_IDX = T_CLASSROOM.SUBJECT_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_CREATE ON T_USER_CREATE.USER_IDX = T_SCHEDULE.CREATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_UPDATE ON T_USER_UPDATE.USER_IDX = T_SCHEDULE.UPDATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_DELETE ON T_USER_DELETE.USER_IDX = T_SCHEDULE.DELETE_USER_IDX WHERE T_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE_IDX = #{scheduleIdx} LIMIT 1
